The Top 3 Voters of each week will receive a reward! Use ::vpanel!
You can use the spinning discord logo to join discord and check updates!
Every attackable npc drops scrap paper!
You can use ::AFK to afk all non combat stats and gain afk tokens!
Quest tab contain's a lot of revelant information for progression!
Theres shortcuts north and west of home to take you around home area faster!
You can claim a free random scroll from the round building west of home every 2 hours!
All monsters drop scrap paper click on the paper to view the shop!
Don't forget to ::vote and then claim your reward by typing ::voted!
Click quest tab, then Char info to see all your points and perks and bonuses!
Most bosses / world events give you XP towards division pass!
You can play our perk minigame in minigames tab to recieve awesome in game boosts!
You can dissolve items for upgrade points at the upgrader
Achievements are a great way to progress early game but also late game!
Click on a skill in your skills tab to teleport to it!
You can use the north of home shortcut to get to the Upgrader to upgrade items!
